Title: God Bless America
Actors: Joel Murray, Tara Lynne Barr, Melinda Page Hamilton, Mackenzie Brooke Smith
Plot: On a mission to rid society of its most repellent citizens, terminally ill Frank makes an unlikely accomplice in 16-year-old Roxy.

Title: The Hunt
Actors: Mads Mikkelsen, Thomas Bo Larsen, Annika Wedderkopp, Lasse Fogelstrøm
Plot: A teacher lives a lonely life, all the while struggling over his son's custody. His life slowly gets better as he finds love and receives good news from his son, but his new luck is about to be brutally shattered by an innocent little lie.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 36 wins & 66 nominations.

Title: The Princess Bride
Actors: Cary Elwes, Mandy Patinkin, Chris Sarandon, Christopher Guest
Plot: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him a story called The Princess Bride.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 7 wins & 8 nominations.
